FuncDef: The display srv6-te policy sid statistics command displays the numbers of End SIDs and End.X SIDs collected from the IS-IS LSDB.
CLIs: display srv6-te policy sid statistics [ isis process <process-id> { level-1 | level-2 | level-1-2 } ]

ParaDef.Info:
The IS-IS process Id.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 4294967295.

The level-1 of the IS-IS protocol.
-

The level-2 of the IS-IS protocol.
-

The level-1-2 of the IS-IS protocol.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check the numbers of End SIDs and End.X SIDs collected from the IS-IS LSDB, run the display srv6-te policy sid statistics command.
The numbers can be queried after fault detection is enabled or within one hour after fault detection is disabled.
